issue.title: [Python] Expose the CopyFiles utility in Python
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13652](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13652). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-9868 added this in C++ (`fs::CopyFiles` (and R `copy_files`) as an utility for copying files between filesystems. It would be useful to add this to the Python bindings as well.
